title: Teaching household management as life skill
description: Teaching household management as life skill
content:
Scenario: Teaching household management as life skill
    Given Kenji is learning to coordinate shared living
    And household management is essential adult capability
    When the personal_agent supports Kenji's household skill development
    Then it should teach him to negotiate responsibilities fairly
    And it should help him communicate needs and boundaries
    And it should build his capability in conflict resolution
    And it should recognize household coordination as professional-grade skill
    And the agent should frame this as valuable life learning
    And Kenji should develop skills that serve all future shared living
